entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is walking with Luna, checking the Marauder's Map to avoid obstacles. He is particularly afraid of Peeves.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is walking with Harry, guiding him through a spiral staircase and knocking on a door.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist that Harry fears encountering.

relationships.description: Harry and Luna are walking together, checking the Marauder's Map to avoid obstacles.
Harry fears encountering Peeves, a poltergeist.
Luna is guiding Harry through a spiral staircase and knocking on a door.
